triplets: Domesticated ruminant mammal bred for wool, meat, and milk
Wool production, meat (mutton, lamb), milk, leather, and grazing for land management
Wool coat, hooves, ears, tail, horns (in some breeds), eyes, muzzle, four legs, stomach compartments
White, black, brown, gray depending on breed
45–160 kg depending on breed and gender
60–120 cm at shoulder depending on breed
